alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 19 at 8:55PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN VENANGO...EASTERN INDIANA...JEFFERSON...EAST CENTRAL ARMSTRONG...CLARION AND FOREST COUNTIES THROUGH 1000 PM EST... At 855 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Titusville to near New Bethlehem to Ligonier. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Oil City, Punxsutawney, Clarion, Brookville, Marienville, Knox, Reynoldsville, Brockway, New Bethlehem, Tionesta, Hasson Heights, and Clymer. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 56 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Armstrong; Clarion; Forest; Indiana; Jefferson; Venango
